sentences.en: A supertanker continues to gush oil off the coast of Spain.
sentences.cn: 西班牙海岸附近的一艘超级油轮仍在大量漏油。

sentences.en: All that pent-up frustration gushed out in a torrent of abuse.
sentences.cn: 所有压抑着的失望与不快通过一阵痛骂全都发泄了出来。

sentences.en: Bigwigs on both sides were also in full - gush mode.
Bright reds and yellows gush a ghastly sight from the darkness.
sentences.cn: 鲜艳的红色黄色忽然涌出,在黑暗里触目惊心.

sentences.en: From the cellar grating floated up the flabby gush of porter.
sentences.cn: 隔着地窖的格子窗飘出走了气的黑啤酒味儿.

sentences.en: He was eager, but did not gush.
sentences.cn: 他很热情, 可是并不噜苏.

sentences.en: Her words gush forth when she meets her mother.
sentences.cn: 见到母亲时,她的话滔滔不绝.

sentences.en: I heard a gush of water.
In a moment more the crowd began to gush forth from the doors of the church.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿,人群便开始从教堂的大门蜂拥而出.

sentences.en: Oh , don't slop and gush and be sentimental.
sentences.cn: 别这样婆婆妈妈:淌眼抹泪的啦.

sentences.en: She felt a gush of pure affection for her mother.
sentences.cn: 对母亲的爱突然涌上她的心头。

sentences.en: The patient may report a large gush of fluid or increased moisture.
sentences.cn: 病人会报告说有大量液体流出或尽是湿度增加.

sentences.en: There are two kinds of flood: rain gush flood and ice flood.
sentences.cn: 黄河流域面临两类洪水的威胁,即暴雨洪水和冰凌洪水.

sentences.en: There was a gush of blood as the arrow was pulled out from the arm.
sentences.cn: 当从手臂上拔出箭来时,一股鲜血涌了出来.

sentences.en: There was a gush of blood from the wound.
When he removed the bandage there was a gush of blood.
sentences.cn: 他解开绷带时鲜血顿时源源不绝的涌出.

words.tran_cn: 涌出的；过分热情的；易动感情的

trans.tran_en: a large quantity of something, usually a liquid, that suddenly pours out of something
if words or emotions gush out, you suddenly express them very strongly
